name: queenly-majesty
effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
